description:
"A complete author's guide to building a successful Kindle publishing business and brand!"

You published your book, designed your author's website, and you have done everything you need to do to market your book, but your book sales are still disappointing.

You know that you have a great book, you know that you have a burning desire to become a #1 bestselling author on Amazon, but you don't know how to attract readers and tell the world about your book. No worries because my mission is to not only help you to achieve publishing success but to help you create a powerful author brand.

This is an exciting day because you are on your way to Kindle publishing success.

Why do you need to join this course? 12 Winning Steps to Being a Highly Profitable Kindle Author is strategically designed to help you approach the marketing of your eBook like an Internet marketer to improve your chances for Kindle success.

If you are ready to go from an unknown author to a serious powerhouse with brand recognition, you are ready to become a KindlePreneur.

Join This Course Today and You Will Learn How To:

Become a successful Kindle publisher

Build your confidence as an author

Have the right mindset for success

Create an author brand that stands out

Develop an action plan to sell more books

Find your target readers and gain advocates of your brand

Convert your blog readers into book buyers

Design a book cover that sells

Write a press release and capture the media's attention to get the publicity your book deserves

Develop a solid book promotion strategy

Establish a strong presence on Amazon

Perfect your media interview skills and on-camera presence

Use the Law of Attraction for Amazon success

And much, much more!

For your convenience, you will find live links to important author and publishing resources at the end of each lecture.

Did You Know That Kindle Publishing Can Help You to Become a Successful Entrepreneur?

If becoming a full-time author is not your cup of tea, you can still take advantage of Kindle publishing opportunities. Publishing books as a part of your company's marketing plan will help you to:

Grow your business and fan base.

Enhance your brand to open more doors for bigger and better opportunities.

Increase your earning potential through sponsorships and public speaking opportunities.

Build authority in your field by demonstrating your expertise and creativity.

</p>

Are you feeling lucky? If you leave your publishing career in the hands of fate or luck then you better try your chances at a casino because your odds are higher at hitting the jackpot than hitting it big as a self-publisher..

The difference between successful authors and unknown authors is purposeful action followed by brand recognition. Make the decision today that you will succeed as a self-publisher and this course will give you the action plan to help you get there.

Join the 12 Winning Steps to Being a Highly Profitable Kindle Author course on Udemy today!
title: 12 Winning Steps to Being a Highly Profitable Kindle Author
